item.title: @elonmusk: THE ECONOMY IS NOT A MAGIC HORN OF PLENTY, IF YOU DONâ€™T MAKE STUFF, THEREâ€™S NO STUFF Some people hav...
item.description: THE ECONOMY IS NOT A MAGIC HORN OF PLENTY, IF YOU DONâ€™T MAKE STUFF, THEREâ€™S NO STUFF Some people have this absurd view that the economy is like some magic horn of plenty. Like it just makes stuff Whatever it is, thereâ€™s a magic horn of plenty, and the goods and services just come from this magic horn of plenty. Like if somebody has more stuff than somebody else, itâ€™s because they took more from this magic horn of plenty Now, let me just break it to the fools out there if you donâ€™t make stuff, thereâ€™s no stuff. If you donâ€™t make the food, if you donâ€™t process the food, if you donâ€™t transport the food, you become detached from reality You can't just legislate money and solve these things. If you donâ€™t make stuff, there is no stuff obviously. Weâ€™ll run out of the stores, and the whole machine just grinds to a halt
